title: We're open for tours today. Schedule your appointment!
posting_body: Picture coming home every day to your beautiful apartment home; you’re stoking the wood-burning fireplace and getting that warmth going while getting comfortable on your nice cozy couch after a long day!
Come and use our gym with multiple treadmills, stationary bikes, free weights, yoga balls and more!
Save some money and gas on a gym membership!
We are located in Everett, with easy access to the I-5, Highway 99, and the 527 exit.

Walden Pond Apartments is just minutes away from Boeing, Marine View Drive, the Everett Naval Base, Downtown Everett, as well as all of the shopping, dining, and entertainment that’s nearby including Everett and Alderwood Mall!

The Winsley provides you with wide selections of one, two and three bedroom apartment homes that feature exclusive community and household amenities like a seasonal outdoor pool, an indoor heated year-round spa, a state-of-the-art fitness center, a FULL SIZE basketball court, and a clubhouse you can lounge in.
Come take a stroll under the sky around the pond, through our pet-friendly community with your favorite furry companion.
Go online to take a look at our photo gallery and schedule your appointment today, or drop by and visit us for your own personal tour!
• The Winsley is open Monday through Sunday (excluding Holidays)
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 1083 Sq.
One Time Pet Fees, Pet Deposits, Pet Rent are per pet in apartment home.
Breed Restrictions Apply, please contact your Leasing Consultant for more information.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
